about_the_game:
"E-Shop Tycoon" is a game about managing an online shopping site in all aspects;

Create your own online shop

Hire new employees, expand your office, deal with cargo companies, advertise, buy new buildings, get ahead of other companies, increase your popularity and earn more.
Start in the garage and buy products from your computer. Sign a contract with a cargo company, build your own warehouse and sell products through your warehouse. Advertise your company to increase your prestige and increase your sales popularity. Sell in bigger places by reaching your targets.

Customize your office

Buy and place items in the office to keep your employees happy. Make your office more usable by buying new items. Customize your office by arranging it the way you want!

Grow and manage your company

Create new departments, upgrade your servers and warehouses or hire more employees to speed things up. Accept deals from other companies for more income!

New departments, new opportunities

Establish your own cargo company, cut the middle man and keep all the profits to yourself!
Found the Software Department to protect your site from hackers by providing a high level of cybersecurity. Return the favor, form shady deals with hackers to attack rival sites and destroy their prestige!

Deal with characters

Throughout the game, meet new characters and try to get along with them.

Your users are key to your success

Manage customer requests and gain prestige by keeping them happy. See how your company is doing on social media and react to the posts of customers and companies. Give interviews to media companies and increase your popularity.
Increase your sales by organizing campaigns and advertising activities. See the results of your advertisements and campaigns as sales results.

Become the largest online sales company on the market

Keep growing your network until the entire world uses the products you sell! Outgrow other companies and even take some over!



Don't stop until you're the biggest!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: E-Shop Tycoon is an isometric online shopping company management game. Fill your warehouses, take orders, hire employees, expand and design your offices. Protect your site against hackers, improve your reputation on social media. Become the best online shopping company in the world!
